name: Eu-cookie
body:
# Simple EU Cookie Banner

* At top of page, push down content, no automatic acceptance.
* At top of page, fixed, with automatic acceptance after 15 seconds.
* At bottom of page, fixed, frequency capped (try refreshing more than 3 times).
tagline: Very simple implementation of a cookie popup notice, configurable re. position and content, includes frequency capping.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
